4_measurement_of_outcomes.description: Outcome measures well-defined and consistently applied?

required_actions: Record all effect estimates with CIs
completion_criteria: Effect estimates and uncertainty measures captured

cross_validation_rules: CI lower bound should be < effect estimate
CI upper bound should be > effect estimate
Effect direction should match verbal description
Sample sizes should be consistent between text and tables

quality_control.acceptance_criteria: 100% agreement on intervention classification, effect estimates within 10% for continuous outcomes

resources.extraction_manual: Refer to workflow guide in main directory
